website_summaries.verdict: A smooth-operating fly reel that holds up even when fishing in salt water, but it’s hampered by roughly machined edges.
pros: Works smoothly in either fresh or salt water
Drag adjustment works well, and drag holds tight when a fish is on the line
cons: Metal burrs on the inside of reel, which can wear on line
Interior rust may be an issue
Drag adjustment increments are very close together

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money, i will probably buy a second one
customer_reviews.text: I bought this reel because it was cheaper than a spare spool for a more expensive reel. I have not regrets, this is a pretty solid product. The drag seems to work well when stripping line. It spins really well, when I give it a smack it will make double digit free rotations. I would consider this a standard arbor size, it fits my 5wt well along with plenty of backing. I would be more likely to buy 4 of these and putting various lines on them then buying a high dollar one.
customer_reviews.author: N. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Low Quality Garbage
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this reel for a fishing trip to Alaska. Didn't need anything special, just a reliable reel for salmon fishing. Used it for less than a day and noticed the line kept moving up in the spool toward the handle. Soon realized the sides of the spool were not "tight" and the line could move freely above where it should be. Tried tightening the screw but to no avail. Soon thereafter, the sides of the reel started pulling apart and the reel became useless. I would never recommend or purchase this reel again.
customer_reviews.author: John M. Amico

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes you get more than you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased this 3/4 wt. reel for my 10 ft. 2 wt. nymphing rod. It proved to be too small and light to counterbalance my rod. So, I loaded one-half of a double-taper 2wt. floating line on the reel to use on my 6'6" small stream fly rod. It's a great fit and the balance is perfect for me. The reel is attractive, with a very nice silver finish. It is smooth and the drag functions very well. In fact this reel works better tha some of my other name brand reels tht cost more than ten times the price. What a great value.
customer_reviews.author: rabbitaco

customer_reviews.title: Great reel for both fresh and salt water.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought two of these reels. Living on the coast I was looking for a reel I could use in both saltwater and fresh at the right price point. These are well made solid reels that didn't disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: WILLIAM S. WILLIAMS

customer_reviews.title: Salmon color not orange..
customer_reviews.text: Reel was a bit scratched. Bought as a damaged box. Color is not orange but salmon. I was looking to find a decent reel in 7/8 wt that could be used on saltwater as well as fresh. Pairing with a st Croix switch. I also bought cheap because I plan on hydro dipping it. I didn’t want to destroy an expensive reel. So far the reel is smooth with a bit of play. Everyone seems to say that goes away when loaded with line.
customer_reviews.author: Rarejul

customer_reviews.title: When I received this the finish was horrible and appears to have rust under it
customer_reviews.text: When I received this the finish was horrible and appears to have rust under it. The color is pink not orange I am returning it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: will ruin your fly line
customer_reviews.text: I bought reel because it was cheep, I did not expect it to destroy my new fly line. The inside edge of the spool is RAZOR sharp, so sharp you can file off your fingernail with it. It shredded my brand new textured line. Do NOT buy this thing. I lost the money the reel cost and a 100.00 on a line and I have to buy a new reel. buying this reel ended up costing me 136.00.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: but I wouldn't recommend this reel i ordered this reel a while back
customer_reviews.text: I might have gotten a lemon, but I wouldn't recommend this reel i ordered this reel a while back, but the main part of the reel broke very easily after using only a few times and i was unable to fix it. is there a way to get a replacement part for the main reel, not the spool?
customer_reviews.author: Alex M.

customer_reviews.title: great price
customer_reviews.text: love this reel for the price, smooth action, i have put this on a seven to eight weight rod, works great not fishing salt water just reaevoirs and rivers, did i mention the price, if i jist get one year out of it and it fells no biggee, 27.00 bucks great price
customer_reviews.author: Mike Ochsenbein

customer_reviews.title: Axle broke on first trip out
customer_reviews.text: I took this reel as a back up bonefishing in the Bahamas. It was working great (caught a dozen bonefish to 8lbs on it) until it slid off the deck into the cockpit of the boat. It fell approximately 12 inches and the whole axle of the reel started to wobble and make the reel inoperable. I took the line off of it and it's now a paperweight on my desk. I thought it was a great deal for the price but I REALLY paid the price when I was changing out lines on the deck of a flats boat instead of catching fish.
customer_reviews.author: Truman Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: No, it isn't made in the USA, nor is it the best ever, but this is a GREAT value with many nice features for an amazing price. I liked the first one so well I bought multiples more just to be sure I have spares in each size I use.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Adams

customer_reviews.title: Price
customer_reviews.text: So far this machined reel is good. It's on a fly rod. I'm not cranking it like a Penn 6500. Great line holder. got the salt water one just for weather proof. Everything seems to work good on this reel. I bought 2 of them.
customer_reviews.author: Randy C. Myers

customer_reviews.title: Most Impressed with this Fly Reel...
customer_reviews.text: Very good...quite impressive I might add. Caught some serious Salmon, and Bonefish and Redfish with this Flyreel
customer_reviews.author: JOE GUIDE

customer_reviews.title: work great.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the first one so much I bought a second as they don't sale spare spools. Both reals work great. for 20 bucks you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Donald R.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time and packaged very nicely. Filled it up with fly line backing and ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and packaged very nicely. Filled it up with fly line backing and 80 yards of #4 WF floating fly line. Have used it once so far and it worked flawlessly. Will be trout fishing for 3 days at the end of Oct, so it should get a good workout. Stay tuned.
customer_reviews.author: Mike B

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Very smooth and clean. No machine marks. The finish is very nice with smooth action. I would recommend this reel at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Day

customer_reviews.title: Great Experience.
customer_reviews.text: It is not a high quality reel, but for the low price, I am very impressed. I believe it will last for many years based on the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel R.

customer_reviews.title: Good value. Good reel.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 now in 3/4wt. 5/6 wt and 7/8. Smooth chatter free drag. Easily switches to left hand retrieve good pricing and solid reel. Would give 5 stars if seller would answer my inquiries about x-tra spools for each reel.
customer_reviews.author: J. Jansen

customer_reviews.title: Great reel for anyone
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Have used for both freshwater smallmouth bass and took it to Florida to battle ladyfish and Jack Crevalle. Worked great. Awesome drag. Beautiful reel.
customer_reviews.author: Treeshear

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good reel and I would recommend as a great value. After extensive use it developed an issue so I contacted customer service. They were extremely responsive and did everything in their power to resolve it. You can buy this reel with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Dave A.

customer_reviews.title: Really nice, I wanted a back up reel but I ...
customer_reviews.text: Really nice, I wanted a back up reel but I might just fish this one. It looks really well made. The orange color isn't really orange more pinkish orange but the quality for the money is amazing
customer_reviews.author: ZVF

customer_reviews.title: One Season Reel
customer_reviews.text: You pretty much get what you pay for. Great looking reel at a great price, but after a year the reversible bearing has given out. If buying just for a single trip or maybe a summer of use, this is your reel. Otherwise spend more for better durability.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn A. Albin

customer_reviews.title: No need for price reels
customer_reviews.text: This reel is so good I bought the silver one too. It is not comparable to high end reels but you can't go wrong with a reel this price in the quality its made.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: May be listed as saltwater reel, but will function just fine for freshwater as well. Easy to switch from right to left retrieve- remove spool from reel and flip the clutch bearing over (nylon insert with metal cleats). That's it- it's easy, anyone can do it. Nice chrome finish.
customer_reviews.author: Ferf

customer_reviews.title: Very nice indeed
customer_reviews.text: Figured I'd leave a review has nice drag looks neat smooth line stripping overall can't beat for the price holds about 30 yards of backing along with 100 yards of fly line and easy to switch from right to left retrieve and honestly it preforms like a $100 reel so I'm satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Michael smith

customer_reviews.title: I baught this reel last May and the first time ...
customer_reviews.text: I baught this reel last May and the first time I used it it cut a 40.00 fly line in half because they didn't round the edeges on the body of the reel . They where as sharp as a knife. I filed them off because I needed the reel,but I wouldn't buy another one unless I knew they changed it.
customer_reviews.author: Clora Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Happy Halloween fishes
customer_reviews.text: Took a chance on this real I really like it everything's kite it's a great bang for the buck wish they had different colors buy it you won't be sorry
customer_reviews.author: john ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great for begginers.
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I started fly fishing for the first time. Bought this reel and I feel like it's an excellent starter reel. Also good for just average fishing. Caught a few small snappers and held up well. I don't need any of those 1000 dollar reels. This one works great for an occasional fisherman like myself.
customer_reviews.author: Mack15405

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful reels for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great little reels for even better prices. I've ordered over a dozen for our fly-fishing club raffles. Never had a problem with any of them. Comparable to reels at two or three times the price.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Easily converts to left or right hand
customer_reviews.text: Over this reel is smooth. Easily converts to left or right hand. Drag feels good but won't know what it is capable of until put to the test. I gave it 4 stars because I loaded backing and saltwater fly line to find it filled the spool to the max. I had to remove some backing. The spool is smaller than my other 7/8 wt reels. Great looking reel but it is more copper than orange.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this reel
customer_reviews.text: Would have given it a .5 star if i could have, bought this reel in December and didn't use it till March, now it is the end of June and the drag system wobbles on the reel case making the spool wobble. This basically is a death sentence for a reel. I understand this is a cheep reel but three months of use. The Fiblink website looks to be worthless
customer_reviews.author: Heather Stockton

customer_reviews.title: Reels nicely. Update this review after actually using it to ...
customer_reviews.text: Loaded it up,back yard,whipped it on out there. Reels nicely. Update this review after actually using it to catch fish.
customer_reviews.author: JHA

customer_reviews.title: They look great but the drag sucks
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of them. They look great but the drag sucks. It is less than 1/8 turn from no drag to locked up. They are sitting in a drawer, I won't use them. Mine are the 9/10 wt, hope the smaller sizes work better. I have not seen any sharp edges on the two I have but that does not gain them any points, it just doesn't loose the few I gave it.
customer_reviews.author: Charles G Worthing

customer_reviews.title: A very affordable and nicely designed fly reel
customer_reviews.text: Nice light fly reel for the price charged. Spool tolerance was a little floppy. Machining is clean. Drag is smooth, reel spins perfectly. Once loaded with backing and line, the initial spool floppiness is completely unnoticeable during use. Great deal for an inexpensive, machined fly reel.
customer_reviews.author: R C G

customer_reviews.title: This reel works excellent, and is a superb value and quality for ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this reel! He says he wish he had found this before purchased a more expensive reel. This reel works excellent, and is a superb value and quality for the price. He is very happy with it and has recommended it to several of his fishing buds. Thanks for such a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Levesque

customer_reviews.title: Exactly why I ordered it to target large fast fish like jacks and red's and the drag is the strongest ...
customer_reviews.text: I'll update with some pics soon if I have any luck in Aransas pass. So far very solid and Very powerful drag. Exactly why I ordered it to target large fast fish like jacks and red's and the drag is the strongest I've owned so far.
customer_reviews.author: Charles J.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price.
customer_reviews.text: Nice reel for the price. If you are just starting to fly fish it is a good beginnger reel with a decent drag. Easy to adjust from left to right handed aswell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful construction.
customer_reviews.text: I am going out fishing the Skagit right now. I'll let you know.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin T.

customer_reviews.title: True value and pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with reel. Well made, solid and drag is smooth. Quick delivery was appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: D. Myers

customer_reviews.title: like the smooth drag adjustment and switching over from right ...
customer_reviews.text: used it sunday, worked flawless on 3 Delaware trout...like the smooth drag adjustment and switching over from right to left hand reel was easy. I would buy again. time will tell on durability but so far im happy.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality reel. I liked it so much that I have bought three.
customer_reviews.author: Terry J. Newman

customer_reviews.title: Geeat
customer_reviews.text: This reel works perfectly, I didn't expect much as the price was so low but I would buy again no problem. Works smooth and looks great
customer_reviews.author: kaido

customer_reviews.title: The fit and finish are excellent. I am excited to spool the reel and ...
customer_reviews.text: Just received my Finlink reel today. When I took it out of the box the first thing I noticed was the color. I ordered the orange; however, the reel is more of a copper color. The reel seems to be very smooth and the drag seems to work well. The fit and finish are excellent. I am excited to spool the reel and get on the water.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great reel
customer_reviews.text: Looks great I can’t wait to use it in may on mine trout fishing trip
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners, but not very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Reel is very smooth with good drag, but it is not very sturdy. I dropped the reel and bent it so that it would no longer work, but fixed it eventually. I would buy it again and just be more careful.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Prather

customer_reviews.title: Lasts multiple seasons and takes a beating.
customer_reviews.text: I live in northern colorado. Fishing is good and super easy with this reel. Was recommended by another angler and I like it
customer_reviews.author: jason pliego

customer_reviews.title: Top of the Line Reel ....At a Budget Price...Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: This Reel is Amazing for the Price ....Smoothest operation of any reel I have tried in a long time....Very Well made and Looks like a Million bucks!!
customer_reviews.author: KYBIKER

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: The reel has no drag system to hold the line on. As soon as you cast it, the remaining line on the reel loosens due to the reel continuing to spin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: scratches easy, the drag seems good
customer_reviews.text: I use it on my streamer 0rod , it holds line! Not to heavy, scratches easy, the drag seems good. For the money it dose what I want.
customer_reviews.author: Big_B

customer_reviews.title: on the first outing that super awesome "knob" fell off into the river on the ...
customer_reviews.text: I have never experienced something more frustrating than trying to put the "knob" on the reel each and every time I had to adjust it. Quite literally would take 5 minutes. Then, on the first outing that super awesome "knob" fell off into the river on the third cast. Still there. 0 Stars.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Cheatham

customer_reviews.title: Barrings went out on the reel. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I am very very disappointed in the reel. I bought this reel for my husband for Christmas and in very first time we used it, the barring went out on it and it is no longer useable. I am so disappointed because we didn't open it and use it until August, so I can't return it or exchange it for a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica H.

customer_reviews.title: Fly fishing
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. And very light weight. Dig the colors as well. Best bang for your buck if you asked me.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher steen

customer_reviews.title: fishing reel
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is my husband is very happy with his new reel.. Since he is so happy with it i suggest anyone looking for a good reel to buy this one... Also very fast service from Buyertrend.
customer_reviews.author: Y. W.

customer_reviews.title: My dad love's it great and on time
customer_reviews.text: My dad love's it great and on time. Bearings are so smooth nice size and the finish was done to perfection.
customer_reviews.author: Elliott

customer_reviews.title: It works great the drag is good and my husband feels like ...
customer_reviews.text: It works great the drag is good and my husband feels like it was a good reel at a good price. Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: SherrySloan

customer_reviews.title: Fly reel
customer_reviews.text: Nice reel but the spool seems a bit loose..tried to tighten it with no luck..Not a bad reel gor the price.
customer_reviews.author: Grampa

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: For the $spent this reel is well worth the price. Drag works quite well and I now own two.
customer_reviews.author: Mike M

customer_reviews.title: Well machined and spins like top. Really
customer_reviews.text: Far and away exceeded my expectations. Well machined and spins like top. Really, really pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas G.

customer_reviews.title: Ordered this reel on the basis of the price. ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this reel on the basis of the price. Pleasantly surprised at the fit and finish. Followed online directions to reverse the wind....worked perfectly. As a backup or rig to bang around the boat this reel fits the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Robert W.

customer_reviews.title: impressive for the price
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product for the price. For people like me who don't fit the stereotype of wealthy country club fly fishermen, can't afford to spend $300+ on a single reel or rod, this reel works as well as any high end reel I've ever used. Drag works well, It is well balanced and machining seems good quality. The only con is there is one edge on the inner rim of the spool that was left sharp and needs to be de-burred or it could damage your fly line over time. Its an easy fix but it should be done during manufacture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's okay for the price
customer_reviews.text: The drag is too sticky is not a smooth drag for the price ain't too bad
customer_reviews.author: bowassassin

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Drag goes after a season or so. Save your money and get a better reel.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great value FOR THE MONEY --- GREAT SERVIC3E FROM THE SELLER
customer_reviews.author: franklin l. pflieger

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: GREAT reel for the money and drag system is super. Held up under some pressure from some large trout.
customer_reviews.author: K. M. McMonigle

customer_reviews.title: 3/4 Size Awesome Creek Reel
customer_reviews.text: I am seriously surprised at the quality of his reel considering the price paid.
customer_reviews.author: B Herries

customer_reviews.title: Fine looking reel which works great for an amazing good ...
customer_reviews.text: I first was very concerned with the performance after having had expensive line put on the reel at a Bass Pro Shop. The drag did not work right at all. As it turned out the reel has a little part that must be reversed to change the default set up (at least on the one I received) from right hand retrieval to left hand retrieval. When I took it back to Bass Pro the fella relieved the problem, reversed the part and now it works perfectly. Fine looking reel which works great for an amazing good price.
customer_reviews.author: JoeS

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The drag system is no good, whole reel spins what the use for adding a drag !!!
customer_reviews.author: Aundrae

customer_reviews.title: Second purchase as good as the first!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this again for a friend after had tried one myself. Great value for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great look
customer_reviews.text: The drag system should be much atronger for such a large arbor reel.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at the quality of the reel for a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: gilbert nathaniel drake

customer_reviews.title: Not large Arbor
customer_reviews.text: The reel works good and is great to date it seems to be of good quality and has nice drag settings the inner hub needed oiled it made some noise prior to oiling. I ordered this reel it sail large Arbor reel . The reel is far from being large arbor its the same size as a pacifsun reel or a medium fly reel.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Way under sized.
customer_reviews.text: Sad with my purchase. Really looking forward to my first half-way decent fly reel (something other than plastic). Ordered the 7/8, looks pretty, however it only holds 70 yards of backing and 100 ft of 8 eight fly line. I guess price is lower because reel is under sized? Want satisfaction. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: First time to Fiblink and am very happy for the price
customer_reviews.text: First time to Fiblink and am very happy for the price. Converted to Rt. hand reel simple and easy (be sure you know which way the bearing comes out so you can reverse it correctly the first time). Caught a couple of Red Salmon on the Kenai River in AK so far, and the reel has been flawless. You can set the drag fairly lite and 'palm' the reel for added drag.
customer_reviews.author: rb

customer_reviews.title: Good reel deal
customer_reviews.text: Great reel for the price. Make sure to clean it thoroughly after each use, meaning taking it apart and washing, especially in salt water. Have yet to test the drag against larger fish but great for smaller species and holds a lot of backing and line.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not large arbor, tore expensive fly line
customer_reviews.text: The cross bars of the frame cut my fly line after 3 uses. So, not only am I out the $30 for the reel but also my $$$ for the fly line that got cut about 30 ft in. Avoid!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: V.G. Value for the $
customer_reviews.text: Bought the 7/8 wt for Saltwater fishing in Florida. Appears to be a nice reel. Just ordered a 5/6 for Peacock & Large Mouth down here. Should have some fun> Cant beat it for the price. You don't need to baby it.
customer_reviews.author: Charles m.

customer_reviews.title: It Doesn't Bear Those "Treasured" Brands - But This Is a Very Good Fly Reel for the Price
customer_reviews.text: It's a really nice reel for the price. Today, I'm very happy with it. I used this reel to fish the Provo River and the Green River in northern Utah last week, and it performed very well. Time will tell whether or not the quality of the material and workmanship will withstand the rigors of outdoor use in various climates over the years.
customer_reviews.author: Lance

customer_reviews.title: I've only used it a couple of times but it seems pretty well made
customer_reviews.text: Not enough room on the 5/6 for enough backing for salt water, returned and got a 7/8 which works great.
customer_reviews.author: Paul E. Temple

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful reel! When loaded and used I'll let you ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful reel! When loaded and used I'll let you know complete details, unfortunately temperature is in single digits right now! Love the fact I can use it for saltwater as well. Look out early season blues! Great price too.
customer_reviews.author: JGil

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: fantastic reel for the price even better than some of my expensive reels MDH.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Hiebing

customer_reviews.title: I haven't used for long but seems sturdy and holds up well to my abuse and the ...
customer_reviews.text: Well balanced reel, I haven't used for long but seems sturdy and holds up well to my abuse and the saltwater quite well, so far so good
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice reel.
customer_reviews.text: beautiful reel. I have only used it once so far, but it looks and feels great !
customer_reviews.author: MR BEECH

customer_reviews.title: if this reel fishes and lasts half as good as it seems now
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet, but, if this reel fishes and lasts half as good as it seems now, it will be a great value, and a fun reel to use. The bearing is smooth as silk and there I practically no run out on the spool. I'll try to update this review after I get to use the reel.
customer_reviews.author: James E Wood

product_meta.title: Fiblink Fly Fishing Reels with Large Arbor 2+1 BB, CNC machined Aluminum Alloy Body and Spool in Fly Reel Sizes 5/6, 7/8
product_meta.description:
Fiblink Fly Fishing Reels with Large Arbor in Fly Reel Sizes 5/6, 7/8 (2+1 BB 1:1 Gear Ratio) 

1. This fly reel is constructed from cold-forged, CNC-machined, high-grade aluminum, and boasts a sealed drag stack. 
2. It is easily adjustable for left-or right-hand retrieve. 
3. Its advanced fiber-composite drag system gives you the control needed to stretch your system to the sporting limit. 
4. Its aluminum construction keeps the strength-to-weight ratio high. 
5. It is ultra-lightweight, yet strong. 

Specifications: 
3/4WF: 2+1 Ball Bearing | 1:1 Gear Ratio | Backing Capacity: 90yds/20lb | 4.2oz | Diameter 2.7inch 
5/6WF: 2+1 Ball Bearing | 1:1 Gear Ratio | Backing Capacity: 105yds/20lb | 5.1oz | Diameter 3.15inch 
7/8WF: 2+1 Ball Bearing | 1:1 Gear Ratio | Backing Capacity: 120yds/20lb | 5.9oz | Diameter 3.54inch 
9/10WF: 2+1 Ball Bearing | 1:1 Gear Ratio | Backing Capacity: 160yds/20lb | 6.1oz | Diameter 3.9inch 

The package includes: 
Fly reel*1 
Drawstring bag*1
feature_bullets: This fly reel is saltwater safe, sealed drag stack; Ultra-lightweight, smart, practical, extremely sleek and athletic
Less line stacking, higher line retrieval rates
One-way bearing for quick and easy left-to-right hand retrieval switch (Regarding instruction for left-to-right hand retrieval switch, please refer to the 7th picture )
